    • build

      private void build​(int x, int y, int z)
      Tries to build a Block in the given position. If position is not allowed, does nothing. If more than one component is available, asks which build
      Parameters:
      x - Coordinate X where to build
      y - Coordinate Y where to build
      z - Coordinate Z where to build

      y - Coordinate Y where to build
      z - Coordinate Z where to build
